column1: '''The Lord of the Rings Fan Club''' was an official club of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. [[Decipher]] ran the club which consisted of 6 magazine issues a year for 3 years
column3: and a store. Unfortunately Decipher had neglected their Lord of the Rings fans as the films drew to a close
column4: they stopped production of the magazines
column5: let their domain expire so an adult company could pick it up
column6: and have neglected their store and forums as well. Luckily the community has stood strong and started new sites.
